body_html:
indeed, if you compile from source, and you want the "binary" version numbers, please export:

export PYTORCH_BUILD_VERSION=0.4.1
export PYTORCH_BUILD_NUMBER=1

@soumith
I tried, but not works, still version number:0.5.0a0+a24163a
I did the following:
export PYTORCH_BUILD_VERSION=0.4.1
export PYTORCH_BUILD_NUMBER=1
sudo python3 setup.py install

then open python3
import pytorch
print(torch.version)
0.5.0a0+a24163a

body:
> indeed, if you compile from source, and you want the "binary" version numbers, please export:
> 
> ```
> export PYTORCH_BUILD_VERSION=0.4.1
> export PYTORCH_BUILD_NUMBER=1
> ```

@soumith 
I tried, but not works, still version number:0.5.0a0+a24163a
I did the following:
export PYTORCH_BUILD_VERSION=0.4.1
export PYTORCH_BUILD_NUMBER=1
sudo python3 setup.py install

then open python3
import pytorch
print(torch.__version__)
 0.5.0a0+a24163a
